scripts.install:backend: cd backend && python3 -m venv venv && ./venv/bin/python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.install:backend2: cd backend && python -m venv venv && .\venv\Scripts\python.exe -m pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.db:diff:dev: dotenv -e .env -- powershell -NoProfile -Command "cd backend; npx supabase db diff -f init_baseline --schema public --linked"
scripts.db:revert:dev: dotenv -e .env -- powershell -NoProfile -Command "cd backend; supabase db push --linked --db-password \"$env:DEV_DB_PASSWORD\""
